arts.ttl: When is the FA Cup quarter-final draw? TV channel and Aston Villa ball number
arts.sum: The quarter-final draw for the FA Cup is scheduled to take place on Sunday, March 2 following the conclusion of the fifth round tie between Manchester United and Fulham. Latest Aston Villa news and gossip as Unai Emery and Co. booked a place in the quarter-final of the FA Cup with a win over Cardiff City

arts.ttl: Roy Keane shares what Marcus Rashford should now be thinking of doing after superb display for Aston Villa tonight
arts.sum: Aston Villa are through to the FA Cup quarter-finals after getting the better of Cardiff City in their fifth-round tie on Friday night. The Villans...

arts.ttl: Ollie Watkins transfer twist as Aston Villa linked with summer raid for £50m Arsenal target
arts.sum: Ollie Watkins transfer twist as Aston Villa linked with summer raid for £50m Arsenal target Aston Villa are being linked with a shock £50m summer raid on Juventus for in-demand striker Dusan Vlahovic.

arts.ttl: Unai Emery praises Marco Asensio and Marcus Rashford after beating Cardiff
arts.sum: The pair have both made a big impact since joining Aston Villa on loan in January.

arts.ttl: Named after Van Basten - Asensio shining at Villa
arts.sum: Marco Asensio has won the Champions League three times and multiple other trophies at Real Madrid and Paris St-Germain but now he is looking to add more silverware with Aston Villa.

arts.ttl: Roy Keane sends brutal Ollie Watkins transfer message to Arsenal
arts.sum: Arsenal failed with a January bid for Aston Villa striker Ollie Watkins and the England international was leading the line as Unai Emery's side moved into the FA Cup quarter-finals

arts.ttl: Asensio double sends Villa into FA Cup quarters
arts.sum: Aston Villa newcomer Marco Asensio struck twice in the second half to lead the Premier League team to a 2-0 victory over second-tier Cardiff City on Friday and into the FA Cup quarter-finals for the first time in 10 years.

arts.ttl: Marco Asensio makes exciting ‘big things’ Aston Villa claim amid Marcus Rashford partnership
arts.sum: Two-goal Aston Villa hero Marco Asensio has said that his team has the quality to do ‘big things’ this season, with Villa now just one win away from a trip to Wembley. The latest Aston Villa news as Marco Asensio was the hero again with a second brace in as many games in the 2-0 win over Cardiff City in the FA Cup

arts.ttl: Unai Emery makes stance clear on Aston Villa's trophy chances after FA Cup win
arts.sum: Unai Emery says Aston Villa are contenders to win the FA Cup after progressing to the quarter-finals for the first time in a decade, but doesn’t believe they should be considered as a favourite. Join our Aston Villa WhatsApp group and get the latest breaking news, interviews and opinion sent straight to your phone, plus matchday team news and live updates of all the action.

arts.ttl: 'Superb' Cardiff City player surprised Omer Riza at Aston Villa as boss full of pride
arts.sum: The Bluebirds manager expressed his delight at his players' performances in the FA Cup tie
